info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-dhcp-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for DHCP Server and Client operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2017-2019, 2022-2023 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Network Services
**Paths:** 42

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-dhcp-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-dhcp-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-dhcp-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-dhcp-oper.html)

get.description: List of DHCPv6 relay binding statistics
List of DHCP clients (OBSOLETE: Use dhcp-oper-data/dhcpv6-bndg-oper instead) (collection)
List of DHCP clients (OBSOLETE: Use dhcp-oper-data/dhcpv6-bndg-oper instead)
List of DHCP clients (OBSOLETE: Use dhcp-oper-data/dhcpv6-relay-bndg-oper instead) (collection)
List of DHCP clients (OBSOLETE: Use dhcp-oper-data/dhcpv6-relay-bndg-oper instead)
List of DHCP clients (OBSOLETE: Use dhcp-oper-data/dhcpv6-bndg-oper instead) (collection)
List of DHCP clients (OBSOLETE: Use dhcp-oper-data/dhcpv6-bndg-oper instead)
List of DHCP clients (OBSOLETE: Use dhcp-oper-data/dhcpv6-relay-bndg-oper instead) (collection)
List of DHCP clients (OBSOLETE: Use dhcp-oper-data/dhcpv6-relay-bndg-oper instead)
